EmailTemplate.name: Digital First.3-?-21 DBNK DF Email 5.4-1-21 DBNK Email 5
EmailTemplate.subject: New Webinar: Making the Shift to Digital-First Banking
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Big tech companies are setting the standard for personalized digital-first experiences. And they’re creeping further into the banking space.
That means your digital transformation plans have taken on a whole new urgency. Because the competition is heating up. And consumers expect digital everything today.
Join our free webinar <[[http://financialbrand.co/ncr-corporate]]> with The Financial Brand to hear NCR’s Doug Brown and Wintrust’s Tom Ormseth discuss how to accelerate a successful digital-first strategy.
In the webinar, you’ll explore:
-
What “digital-first” banking really means
-
Proprietary research on FI consumer sentiment
-
The features and experiences consumers want ${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
